item.title: Version 2.4.0
item.description:
[2.4.0] - 2026-02-18

Added

  • WebAssembly Engine: The simulation engine is now available as a standalone WASM module
  • Run digital logic simulations in the browser or Node.js — no desktop app required
  • ~385KB total (96KB JS + 289KB WASM)
  • Full TypeScript type definitions with branded gate IDs for type-safe pin names
  • All gate types supported: AND, OR, XOR, XNOR, BUFFER, CLOCK, MUX, DECODER, JKFF, REGISTER, RAM, and more
  • step() / stepN() API returns changed wires and simulation time
  • Published as [@cedarville/cedarlogic-engine](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@cedarville/cedarlogic-engine) on npm
  • See the [WebAssembly wiki page](https://github.com/taciturnaxolotl/CedarLogic/wiki/WebAssembly) for full docs
  • CI: WASM build and npm publish
  • Release workflow now builds the WASM bundle and includes it as a release artifact
  • Automatic npm publish with OIDC provenance on every release

Full Changelog: https://github.com/taciturnaxolotl/CedarLogic/compare/v2.3.12...v2.4.0
